review.comment: Our nonprofit needed logos created for some upcoming events and without much direction on our part, John created some fantastic logos for us to choose from. We were very pleased with the quality as well as his turnaround time. Highly recommend John Potter Media!

I recently started a new business in March. I was not sure if I should go with a free web designer or hire a professional. Just minutes with talking with John I knew I would in great hands and get the most for my money. He listened to my wants for the website and went above and beyond what I had imagined it to be. He was very patient and guided me with every question I had, even if they were they same questions weeks later. We highly recommend John Potter Media
review.review_reply: Thank you Shannon! It has been a pleasure working with you during this crazy time in the world! I look forward to working together!

review.comment: John designed our website, logo and banners for our store! They look awesome! We gave him a mock up of what we were thinking and he was able to design something very professional and then adjust it for web, print and even vinyl banners. Definitely recommend John Potter Media for graphic design and internet advertising.

We highly recommend John and his team for web design and online marketing. He designed our beautiful website and helped us advertising on Facebook and Yelp. yelp has really helped us a lot getting more customers. john is funny and great to work with highly recommend John Potter Media!

John did our website and social media pages. They came out beautiful and we love the design and look of the website and facebook page. He is always available to talk when we need help. He also set us up on adwords and trained us how to manage the account within our budget. We highly recommend John Potter Media for web design and internet marketing!

John designed our website and has been available and reliable whenever we need to update or change something on the website. He is easy to work with and communicates clearly. We highly recommend John Potter Media for web design and online marketing!
